alerts.text: The February 25, 2025 patch is expected to break many mods. I am currently very busy and cannot test my mods for compatibility with this patch. I recommend that you either do not update your game, or if you do, play in new saves with my mods uninstalled until I test/fix them.

Regardless of compatibility with the patch, Language Barriers will be receiving an update to add a new language for the new world of Nordhaven in the Businesses & Hobbies expansion pack (releasing on March 6th). Keep your eyes on my Bluesky, Discord, or website.
